org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc

Class OrcFile.WriterOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions
      • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    OrcFile

    public static class OrcFile.WriterOptions
extends org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions
    Options for creating ORC file writers.

    • Method Summary

      Sets whether the HDFS blocks are padded to prevent stripes from straddling blocks.

      Comma separated values of column names for which bloom filter is to be created.

      Specify the false positive probability for bloom filter.
      OrcFile.WriterOptions bufferSize(int value)
      The size of the memory buffers used for compressing and storing the stripe in memory.
      OrcFile.WriterOptions callback(org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterCallback callback)
      Add a listener for when the stripe and file are about to be closed.

      Sets the generic compression that is used to compress the data.

      Sets the encoding strategy that is used to encode the data.

      Provide the filesystem for the path, if the client has it available.

      A required option that sets the object inspector for the rows.

    • Method Detail

      • inspector

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions inspector(ObjectInspector value)
        A required option that sets the object inspector for the rows. If setSchema is not called, it also defines the schema.

      • setSchema

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions setSchema(org.apache.orc.TypeDescription schema)
        Set the schema for the file. This is a required parameter.
        Overrides:

      • fileSystem

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions fileSystem(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem value)
        Provide the filesystem for the path, if the client has it available. If it is not provided, it will be found from the path.
        Overrides:
        fileSystem in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions

      • stripeSize

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions stripeSize(long value)
        Set the stripe size for the file. The writer stores the contents of the stripe in memory until this memory limit is reached and the stripe is flushed to the HDFS file and the next stripe started.
        Overrides:
        stripeSize in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions

      • blockSize

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions blockSize(long value)
        Set the file system block size for the file. For optimal performance, set the block size to be multiple factors of stripe size.
        Overrides:
        blockSize in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions

      • rowIndexStride

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions rowIndexStride(int value)
        Set the distance between entries in the row index. The minimum value is 1000 to prevent the index from overwhelming the data. If the stride is set to 0, no indexes will be included in the file.
        Overrides:
        rowIndexStride in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions

      • bufferSize

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions bufferSize(int value)
        The size of the memory buffers used for compressing and storing the stripe in memory.
        Overrides:
        bufferSize in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions

      • blockPadding

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions blockPadding(boolean value)
        Sets whether the HDFS blocks are padded to prevent stripes from straddling blocks. Padding improves locality and thus the speed of reading, but costs space.
        Overrides:
        blockPadding in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions

      • encodingStrategy

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions encodingStrategy(org.apache.orc.OrcFile.EncodingStrategy strategy)
        Sets the encoding strategy that is used to encode the data.
        Overrides:
        encodingStrategy in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions

      • paddingTolerance

        public OrcFile.WriterOptions paddingTolerance(double value)
        Sets the tolerance for block padding as a percentage of stripe size.
        Overrides:
        paddingTolerance in class org.apache.orc.OrcFile.WriterOptions
